recipe.title: Blueberry Lemon Yogurt Muffins Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; plain greek yogurt ; (140 g)
1 ½ cups ; whole wheat flour ; (195 g)

steps.step: Grease a muffin tin of muffin liners with cooking spray. Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and sugar.
Add Greek yogurt, applesauce, honey, vanilla extract, lemon zest, and lemon juice. Mix until well combined.
Stir in flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
Distribute batter evenly among prepared muffin cups, filling about ¾ of the way full. Top with additional blueberries if desired.
Cool muffins in pan for 10 minutes before serving.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Grease a muffin tin of muffin liners with cooking spray.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and sugar.
Add Greek yogurt, applesauce, honey, vanilla extract, lemon zest, and lemon juice.
Stir in flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
Distribute batter evenly among prepared muffin cups, filling about ¾ of the way full.
Top with additional blueberries if desired.
Cool muffins in pan for 10 minutes before serving.
